original_text: and brought his head on a platter and gave it to the girl, and the girl gave it to her mother.
korean_text: 그 머리를 소반에 얹어다가 소녀에게 주니 소녀가 이것을 그 어머니에게 주니라

sentences.original_text: and brought his head on a platter
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 머리를 쟁반에 담아 가져왔고

sentences.original_text: and gave it to the girl
and the girl gave it to her mother.
